title: Process a Room Charge at the Restaurant
description: A hotel guest dining at the on-site restaurant wants to charge their meal to their room.

tasks.description: The server asks for the guest's last name and room number.
tasks.expected_outcome: The server collects the necessary information.

tasks.description: The server uses the POS system to look up the guest and verify their identity.
tasks.expected_outcome: The POS system confirms the guest is currently in-house.

tasks.description: The server posts the check total to the guest's room folio.
tasks.expected_outcome: The charge is successfully added to the guest's main hotel bill.
